snippet: The organization claims to represent everyday gun owners, but its lobbying work can have a more sinister impact.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Alan Berlow accuses National Rifle Association of fostering criminality by intimidating politicians who oppose it and undermining law enforcement through its lobbying work; argues NRA poorly represents its constituency, citing polls showing vast majority of gun owners support background checks for all buyers, which NRA strongly opposes.
lead_paragraph: The organization claims to represent everyday gun owners, but its lobbying work can have a more sinister impact.
